Generation V.Black: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
Generation V.White: These remarkably intelligent Pokémon fight by controlling arms that can grip with rock-crushing power.
Generation V.Black 2: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
Generation V.White 2: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.

Generation VI.X: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
Generation VI.Y: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

Generation VIII.Sword: While it could use its psychic abilities in battle, this Pokémon prefers to swing its powerful arms around to beat opponents into submission.
Generation VIII.Shield: It's said that drinking the liquid surrounding Reuniclus grants wisdom. Problem is, the liquid is highly toxic to anything besides Reuniclus itself.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Their arms are made of a special liquid. They use psychic power to control these arms and crush boulders.
Generation IX.Violet: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
